name: Waitin' Satan
description:
Made in 48 hours for the #ldjam49

Overview

Satan is hungry and he wants to speak to the manager! It’s too hot in the kitchen but there’s no way out!

You are a waiter in Hell and your only customer is Satan himself. Get to the end of each level as quickly as possible with as much food intact. Move the plate left and right underneath the the food as it falls to keep it balanced.

5 levels to play in total, each with increasing sizes of food and deadly traps to navigate.

Controls

A, D to move your Waiter

←, → to balance the plate

Spacebar to jump
